title: Arlington/ Cambridge Line
posting_body: Exquisitely renovated sun filled 2 bedroom home in a 1920's Arts & Crafts style home situated on a quiet tree lined street in East Arlington.
The home received a High End Renovation & now retains its original charm & modern amenities as well.
The front foyer has a small coat closet.
The living room is nicely proportioned, has a brick fireplace, & three windows that look out to the new front porch.

The dining room also has three windows and it's original built-in china cabinet, a swinging door leads to the pantry that also retains its original built-ins & has newly installed cabinetry to compliment the old and increase the utility of the space.
The natural wood countertops in this room provide additional prep. area.
A window overlooks the side yard.
The custom kitchen has recessed lighting & brushed nickel accent lighting fixtures,
Craft Maid Maple cabinets with a hand-rubbed finish, glazed ceramic tile back splash, and black countertops.

The kitchen is equipped with Kenmore stainless steel appliances including a Self-cleaning gas range with 4 sealed burners with differing BTU outputs for various cooking needs, QuietGuard dishwasher with time delay, and a frost-free refrigerator.
The kitchen has a small breakfast area & a small mudroom off the kitchen has a washer & dryer.
The mudroom leads out to a newly built exclusive-use porch, and the yard.
The tiled bath has a Thomasville maple vanity, with a Roma solid-surface top, and Kohler fixtures.
A small hall off the bath has a spacious linen closet.
Two equal sized bedrooms, each with two windows, and nicely sized closets.
Original Arts & Crafts natural woodwork, picture & chair rails.
Newly renovated garage parking for one car is equipped with a remote activated garage door opener & polished concrete flooring.
Avenue provide service to Alewife, Porter & Harvard stations.
Walk to the Capitol Theater, Mass.

3/10ths of a mile from Cambridge line, less than a mile from Rt. 2, less than 3 miles from Harvard Square, 3 miles from Tufts University's Somerville Campus, and 4 miles from Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
Please inquire for more information, pictures, link to a Video tour, or for an appointment to view the property.
Prices and availability are subject to change without notice.
